events.title: Lance Corporals William Schofield and Tom Blake are given an urgent message to deliver

movie.plot: At the height of the First World War, two young British soldiers must cross enemy territory and deliver a message that will stop a deadly attack on hundreds of soldiers.

studios.title: The Canadian Film or Video Production Tax Credit (CPTC)

movie.title: La Vie en Rose
movie.plot: From the mean streets of the Belleville district of Paris to the dazzling limelight of New York's most famous concert halls, Edith Piaf's life was a constant battle to sing and survive, to live and love. Raised in her grandmother's brothel, Piaf was discovered in 1935 by nightclub owner Louis Leplee, who persuaded her to sing despite her extreme nervousness. Piaf became one of France's immortal icons, her voice one of the indelible signatures of the 20th century.

events.title: Arnold Mack, who Ferdi Elsas is based on, is arrested

movie.title: The Clearing
movie.plot: When affluent executive Wayne Hayes is kidnapped by a disgruntled employee and held for ransom in a forest, Wayne‚Äôs wife is forced to reckon with the FBI agents as they negotiate with the kidnapper.

events.title: Rwandan president Juv√©nal Habyarimana is killed

movie.title: Hotel Rwanda
movie.plot: Inspired by true events, this film takes place in Rwanda in the 1990s when more than a million Tutsis were killed in a genocide that went mostly unnoticed by the rest of the world. Hotel owner Paul Rusesabagina houses over a thousand refuges in his hotel in attempt to save their lives.
movie.awards: Nominated for 3 Oscars. Another 16 wins & 45 nominations.
